pageContext.collection_description: Contains bound scripts for serial radio programs, 1929-1941, including 44 volumes of The Lone Ranger, 1932-1937, 63 volumes of The Green Hornet, 1936-1941, and The Crimson Fang. Also includes a case history of the filming of The Lone Ranger for Republic Studios and taped interviews with Lee Trent, 1970, and Paul Harris, 1973, regarding radio performances of The Lone Ranger and other serials for WEBR in the 1930s.
